After a claim is registered, it is examined by a claims officer.
The claims officer then writes a â€ùsettlement recommendationâ€ù.
This recommendation is then checked by a senior claims officer who may mark the claim as â€ùOKâ€ù or â€ùNot OKâ€ù.
If the claim is marked as â€ùNot OKâ€ù, it is sent back to the claims officer and the recommendation is repeated.
